actionDecl.name: StreamBlockVerifyForwarding
actionDecl.label: Verify Traffic Forwarding
actionDecl.tooltip: Verifies that the test topology can forward test traffic
actionDecl.description: Verifies that the test topology can forward test traffic

actionDecl.name: CaptureStart
actionDecl.label: Start Capture
actionDecl.tooltip: Starts the capture engine on a specified port.
actionDecl.description: Starts the capture engine on a specified port.

actionDecl.name: CaptureStop
actionDecl.label: Stop Capture
actionDecl.tooltip: Stops the capture engine on a specified port.
actionDecl.description: Stops the capture engine on a specified port.

actionDecl.name: CaptureDataSave
actionDecl.label: Save Capture Data
actionDecl.tooltip: Saves the capture buffer into a '*.SCAP' or '*.PCAP' file format.
actionDecl.description: Saves the capture buffer into a '*.SCAP' or '*.PCAP' file format.

parameter.name: IsScap
parameter.label: IsScap
parameter.tooltip: File type to save (Scap or Pcap)
parameter.description: File type to save (Scap or Pcap)

parameter.name: StartFrameIndex
parameter.label: StartFrameIndex
parameter.tooltip: Start index of the captured packets that you will like to be saved
parameter.description: Start index of the captured packets that you will like to be saved

parameter.name: EndFrameIndex
parameter.label: EndFrameIndex
parameter.tooltip: End index of the captured packets that you will like to be saved
parameter.description: End index of the captured packets that you will like to be saved

actionDecl.name: SequencerStop
actionDecl.label: Stop Command Sequencer
actionDecl.tooltip: Stops sequencer execution and sets sequencer TestState.
actionDecl.description: Stops sequencer execution and sets sequencer TestState.

actionDecl.name: SequencerLoop
actionDecl.label: Loop
actionDecl.tooltip: Executes commands in the loop once for each iteration.
actionDecl.description: Executes commands in the loop once for each iteration.

actionDecl.name: Wait
actionDecl.label: Wait
actionDecl.tooltip: Blocks sequencer execution for specified amount of time.
actionDecl.description: Blocks sequencer execution for specified amount of time.

actionDecl.name: AddChartMarker
actionDecl.label: Add Chart Marker
actionDecl.tooltip: Adds a user event marker to real-time charts.
actionDecl.description: Adds a user event marker to real-time charts.

actionDecl.name: VerifyResultsValue
actionDecl.label: Verify Result Value
actionDecl.tooltip: Verifies that a result value satisfies some boolean expression
actionDecl.description: Verifies that a result value satisfies some boolean expression

actionDecl.name: PhyVerifyLinkUp
actionDecl.label: Verify Link Status
actionDecl.tooltip: Verify if link is up for Port.
actionDecl.description: Verify if link is up for Port.

parameter.name: HandleList
parameter.label: HandleList
parameter.tooltip: List object handles to start High Resolution Sampling
parameter.description: List object handles to start High Resolution Sampling

parameter.name: HandleList
parameter.label: HandleList
parameter.tooltip: List of object handles to stop High Resolution Sampling
parameter.description: List of object handles to stop High Resolution Sampling

parameter.name: HandleList
parameter.label: HandleList
parameter.tooltip: List of object handles to trigger High Resolution Sampling
parameter.description: List of object handles to trigger High Resolution Sampling

actionDecl.name: DetectSourceMac
actionDecl.label: Detect Source Mac
actionDecl.tooltip: Use source MAC address from physical interface.
actionDecl.description: Use source MAC address from physical interface.

actionDecl.name: IterateCombo
actionDecl.label: Iterate Combo Command
actionDecl.tooltip: Iterate parameters over a combo of iteration commands.
actionDecl.description: Iterate parameters over a combo of iteration commands.

actionDecl.name: IterateTrial
actionDecl.label: Iterate Trial Command
actionDecl.tooltip: Keep track of trial iterations when used in a loop.
actionDecl.description: Keep track of trial iterations when used in a loop.

actionDecl.name: IterateThroughput
actionDecl.label: Iterate Throughput
actionDecl.tooltip: Calculates and adjusts throughput when used in a loop command.
actionDecl.description: Calculates and adjusts throughput when used in a loop command.

actionDecl.name: SetDuration
actionDecl.label: Set Traffic Duration
actionDecl.tooltip: Sets the duration of traffic generation.
actionDecl.description: Sets the duration of traffic generation.

actionDecl.name: IterateMulticastGroupCount
actionDecl.label: Iterate Multicast Group Count
actionDecl.tooltip: Adjusts the multicast group count of associated multicast group objects when used in a loop command.
actionDecl.description: Adjusts the multicast group count of associated multicast group objects when used in a loop command.

actionDecl.name: EOTResultsWriteIteration
actionDecl.label: Save Iteration Results
actionDecl.tooltip: Acquires basic port and iteration statistics.
actionDecl.description: Acquires basic port and iteration statistics.

actionDecl.name: StreamBlockStart
actionDecl.label: Start StreamBlocks
actionDecl.tooltip: Transmit a selected list of stream blocks.
actionDecl.description: Transmit a selected list of stream blocks.

actionDecl.name: StreamBlockStop
actionDecl.label: Stop StreamBlocks
actionDecl.tooltip: Stop transmission of a selected list of stream blocks.
actionDecl.description: Stop transmission of a selected list of stream blocks.

actionDecl.name: StreamBlockActivate
actionDecl.label: Activate/Deactivate StreamBlocks
actionDecl.tooltip: Activate or deactivate a selected list of stream blocks.
actionDecl.description: Activate or deactivate a selected list of stream blocks.

actionDecl.name: TimedResultLoggingStopAll
actionDecl.label: Stop All Timed Result Loggings
actionDecl.tooltip: Stop All timed loggings of results.
actionDecl.description: Stop All timed loggings of results.

actionDecl.name: GenerateStreamBlockFromPcap
actionDecl.label: Generate Stream Block From Pcap
actionDecl.tooltip: Generates a raw stream block on given port using specified pcap file.
actionDecl.description: Generates a raw stream block on given port using specified pcap file.
